text: Ranulph was the first recorded Archdeacon of Leicester:University of Leicester he was appointed by Remigius, Bishop of Lincoln in 1092. == Notes == ==Also see== * Diocese of Lincoln * Diocese of Peterborough * Diocese of Leicester * Archdeacon of Leicester Category:Archdeacons of Leicester Category:11th- century English people
title: Ranulph (Archdeacon of Leicester)
